translation.en: [David Attenborough impersonation] In a time when Mother Nature
was still just a babe in the wood...
translation.zh: 还只是一个单纯的孩子时
能够充满各种各样的生物

translation.en: And when her wondrous vision came to pass,
translation.zh: 当她的奇妙希冀实现时

translation.en: she gazed upon the primordial ooze
that she still had some leftover ooze.
translation.zh: 她还有一些剩下的流浆

translation.en: And from those remaining glops of goo,
translation.zh: 她用那些残留的粘稠物
是啊 是啊 哈利路亚！

translation.en: I am Mother Nature, and that's right,
translation.zh: 我就是大自然母亲 没有错

translation.en: I did create some of the most spectacular creatures
translation.zh: 我确实创造了一些人类见过的

translation.en: but I also made some pretty bizarre artistic choices.
translation.zh: 但我也做过一些很奇异的艺术选择

translation.en: being strange got a bad rap.

translation.zh: 不意味着它不值得存在
是吧 四眼彩虹屁股？
没有鼻子的冷漠小可爱？
异于寻常 异于寻常
因此 我要向大家展示

translation.en: Rebels amongst regulars, that must truly be seen to be believed.
translation.zh: 正规军中的反叛者 那些只有亲眼所见才能相信的生物们

translation.en: We begin this one... with number two.
translation.zh: 我们从便便开始说起吧

translation.en: Dung beetles are insects that feed either partly or exclusively
translation.zh: 蜣螂这种昆虫 部分或完全

translation.en: on the feces of other animals.
translation.zh: 以其他动物的粪便为食

translation.en: You thought your paleo diet was hard to stomach!
translation.zh: 你还觉得原始人饮食法难以忍受呢！

translation.en: And just like those other Beatles,
these little rock stars are shooting right up the charts.
translation.zh: 这些小摇滚明星也有自己的热门单曲

translation.en: [announcer] Uh, ladies and gentlemen, The Dung Beetles!
translation.zh: 好了 女士们 先生们 有请蜣螂！

translation.en: ♪ Here's a story 'bout a bug you know ♪
translation.zh: 这段故事讲述了你知道的一种昆虫

translation.en: ♪ They live on farms and grasslands, oh ♪
translation.zh: 它们生活在农场和草地上

translation.en: ♪ You see these critters Everywhere you go ♪
translation.zh: 这些小动物 到处都能看到

translation.en: ♪ They don't care What kind of food they eat ♪
translation.zh: 它们不在乎吃什么东西

translation.en: ♪ This one's crazier than Fred VanVleet ♪
translation.zh: 这家伙比弗雷德范弗里特还疯狂

translation.en: ♪ Stick to their diet man They never cheat ♪
translation.zh: 它们只吃一种食物 从不挑剔

translation.en: [girls screaming] Dung Beetles! Dung Beetles! Dung Beetles!
Oh my God, have my babies, Dwellie!
translation.zh: （钻钻） 天啊 我要给你生孩子 钻钻！

translation.en: ♪ So there's a scarab That you thought you knew ♪
translation.zh: 你觉得自己了解这种甲虫

translation.en: ♪ Five thousand species Only one loves poo ♪
translation.zh: 五千种生物里 只有它喜欢便便

translation.en: ♪ Don't invite them to your barbecue ♪
translation.zh: 你的烧烤派对 不要邀请它们加入

translation.en: [Dung Beetle shouting] I've got feces on me pincers!
Sorry, but this nightmare on elm tree
translation.zh: 抱歉 榆树上的这条猛鬼

translation.en: isn't much of a palate cleanser.
It's the creepiest, crawliest thing I ever created.
translation.zh: 这是我创造的 最恐怖、最毛骨悚然的东西
蜈蚣一词的意思是百足

translation.en: which is odd, because most centipedes don't have a hundred feet.
translation.zh: 有点奇怪 因为大多数蜈蚣没有一百只脚
干得漂亮 给动物起名的人

translation.en: Either way, that's still a lot of slimy legs
translation.zh: 不管怎样 它还是有很多黏糊糊的脚

translation.en: to crawl across your face at night.
translation.zh: 想象一下 它在夜里爬过你的脸

translation.en: Centipedes thrive in dark, warm, humid environments,
translation.zh: 蜈蚣喜欢黑暗、温暖、潮湿的环境

translation.en: or a hipster's beanie in the summertime.
translation.zh: 或者是夏天的毛线潮帽里

translation.en: Using their front two legs like fangs,
translation.zh: 蜈蚣用两条尖牙一样的前腿

translation.en: centipedes inject their victim with venom,
translation.zh: 把毒液注射到受害者体内

translation.en: then curl around the creature and wait patiently for it to expire.
translation.zh: 然后蜷缩在受害者身上 耐心地等它死去

translation.en: [caterpillar] Ooh, look at me, I'm dying.
translation.zh: 快看我啊 我要死了
让我们到马达加斯加去看看吧

translation.en: an island so incredibly strange and jam-packed with nutso creatures,
translation.zh: 这座岛屿奇异异常 到处都是疯狂的生物

translation.en: you basically have to be on fire to stand out.
translation.zh: 想要脱颖而出 还真得有真本事呢
如今 人人都为壁虎疯狂

translation.en: They have sticky feet and adorbs little grins.
translation.zh: 它们有黏黏的脚丫和可爱的笑容

translation.en: But... deep within this exotic island
translation.zh: 但在这座奇异岛屿的深处

translation.en: lives a member of the gecko family
they don't even want to talk about.
translation.zh: 连它们自己都不愿谈论
杀戮 杀戮 杀戮 杀戮

translation.en: Every family has its black sheep.
has a flattened tail with notches
translation.zh: 有一条扁平的尾巴 上面遍布凹痕

translation.en: to mimic a dying or decaying leaf.
translation.zh: 就像死亡或腐烂的树叶

translation.en: They do this to blend into their habitat,
translation.zh: 它们长成这样 是为了融入栖息地

translation.en: and also because death and decay are wicked cool to demons!
translation.zh: 也因为恶魔喜欢死亡和腐烂的装扮

translation.en: ♪ Death and decay Death and decay ♪
translation.zh: 死亡和腐烂 死亡和腐烂

translation.en: he just painted his bedroom black and screamed...
translation.zh: 它把卧室涂成黑色 然后…

translation.en: [gecko teenager] You're not my real father!
...to someone who actually is his real father.
translation.zh: 朝着自己的亲生父亲尖叫

translation.en: Lord Satan Gecko uses his long mobile tongue to wipe off dust and debris.
translation.zh: 撒旦魔王壁虎用它的长舌头 来擦去尘埃和碎片

translation.en: ♪ Dust and debris, Dust and debris ♪
translation.zh: 尘埃和碎片 尘埃和碎片

translation.en: All of the aforementioned reasons are why the normal gecko family
translation.zh: 就因为这些原因 普通壁虎家族

translation.en: no longer invites the satanic leaf-tailed gecko
translation.zh: 不再邀请撒旦叶尾壁虎
杀戮 杀戮 杀戮 杀戮

translation.en: [gecko teenager] Why am I always at the kids' table?
translation.zh: 为什么我总坐在儿童桌上？

translation.en: The low-lying wetlands of North America

translation.zh: 布满了面目狰狞的怪物

translation.en: whose personalities range from mellow... to psycho!
translation.zh: 它的个性时而温和 时而变态

translation.en: you just have to do a little digging.
translation.zh: 你只需要稍微挖掘一下

translation.en: and I'm a star-nosed mole attorney.
Friends, did you know, you already may be entitled
translation.zh: 朋友们 你知道吗 你可能已经被判了

translation.en: -to an absurd financial settlement? -[cash register rings]
translation.zh: 一笔不合理的赔偿和解

translation.en: Uh, excuse me, but what makes you such a great lawyer?
translation.zh: 不好意思 你为什么觉得 自己是一名优秀的律师呢？

translation.en: First of all, let me ask the questions, Miss Nature.
translation.zh: 首先让我来提问 大自然女士

translation.en: But also, that's a great question!
translation.zh: 不过你的问题问得很好

translation.en: My snout is outfitted with 25,000 minute receptors,
translation.zh: 我的鼻子拥有25000个微感受器

translation.en: each working to sniff out the best outcome for your wallet.
translation.zh: 能够为你的钱包找到最好的解决方案

translation.en: You must have the greatest sense of smell ever!

translation.zh: 是呢 很奇怪 但这是真的 宝贝

translation.en: I really only use these pink doodads to feel around for justice.
translation.zh: 我只是使用这些粉红的触手 来寻找正义

translation.en: So that means you must have incredible vision.
translation.zh: 那看来你的视力肯定相当敏锐了
严格来说 我们都是瞎子
等一下 午饭时间到了

translation.en: Anyway, I'm an excellent digger, too.
translation.zh: 话说回来 我也是出色的挖掘工

translation.en: Using my front paws as shovels
to make tunnels that can go down a hundred feet or more.
translation.zh: 可以挖出长达一百英尺或更深的隧道

translation.en: So I know where all the bodies are buried.
translation.zh: 所以我知道 所有尸体埋在哪里

translation.en: But are you sensitive to your clients' needs?
translation.zh: 但你对客户的需求敏感吗？
我那粉红色的星形鼻子

translation.en: is the most sensitive touch organ of any mammal,
translation.zh: 是所有哺乳动物中最敏感的触觉器官

translation.en: packed with over a hundred thousand nerve fibers.
translation.zh: 里面有超过十万的神经纤维
好吧 要不我就雇佣你吧

translation.en: Call me today. Call me yesterday.
translation.zh: 今天就打给我吧 昨天打也行
是啊 我可以穿越时空

translation.en: [Mother Nature] In the decidedly more sultry climate of Southeastern Asia,
translation.zh: 在东南亚更闷热的气候里

translation.en: lives a creature you'll have to set an alarm
translation.zh: 有这样一种生物 必须设置闹钟

translation.en: I... am a pygmy... slow... loris.
making me... the only... poisonous primate.
translation.zh: 我是唯一一种有毒的灵长类动物

translation.en: Someone should make fireworks... for the daytime...
translation.zh: 应该有人在白天放烟花

translation.en: Ever notice how the most normal-looking critters
translation.zh: 你是否注意到 那些看起来最普通的动物

translation.en: are always secretly the biggest freaks?
translation.zh: 实际却总是最大的怪物？

translation.en: Let's take a trip [Aussie voice] down under,
and get to the bottom of what makes this pearlfish so peculiar.
translation.zh: 弄清楚是什么让这条珍珠鱼如此怪异

translation.en: The pearlfish seems like a nice enough fella,
what he's about to do to this otherwise unassuming neighbor.
translation.zh: 它要怎么对付这位低调的邻居

translation.en: That yellow creature next to it is one of my sea cucumbers,
translation.zh: 旁边的黄色生物是海参

translation.en: and that little hole is its tushy.
translation.zh: 那个小洞就是她的屁股

translation.en: The pearlfish wants to live inside the sea cucumber's rectum.
translation.zh: 珍珠鱼想要住进海参的直肠里

translation.en: This meet-cute starts off like any good rom-com,
translation.zh: 这次见面就像所有浪漫喜剧一样

translation.en: with the pearlfish gauging the sea cucumber's tolerance...
translation.zh: 珍珠鱼通过闻她的口气
来测试海参的忍受程度

translation.en: Sea cucumbers actually breathe out of their butts.
translation.zh: 海参实际是通过屁股呼吸的

translation.en: And once it finds just the right spot,
the pearlfish gears up to slide right into her BMs.
translation.zh: 珍珠鱼就会快速滑进她的屁股

translation.en: Now inside the cucumber's poo hamper,
translation.zh: 钻进海参的便便通道后

translation.en: the pearlfish has a nice safe spot away from predators.
translation.zh: 珍珠鱼找到了远离捕食者的安全地点

translation.en: But all that work does stimulate an appetite,
translation.zh: 这些活动量很能刺激食欲

translation.en: so the pearlfish will actually snack -on the cucumber's gonads... -[fart sound]
translation.zh: 所以珍珠鱼会吃掉海参的生殖腺

translation.en: As many as 15 pearlfish have been found
living inside one poor sea cucumber's booty,
translation.zh: 同时住在一个可怜的海参体内

translation.en: and they're also known to mate while inside there.
We move west, to the vastness of Africa,
translation.zh: 我们向西来到广袤的非洲

translation.en: the home office to a wide array of beautiful beasts.
translation.zh: 这里是各种美丽野兽的总部

translation.en: But when it comes to the strangest things on the continent,
translation.zh: 但说到大陆上最奇怪的生物

translation.en: beauty may only be skin deep
but ugly goes straight to the bone!
And we marabous play in smelly bogs.
translation.zh: 我们喜欢恶臭的沼泽里嬉戏

translation.en: Look at us poor trash birds. Ugh!
translation.zh: 看看我们这些可怜的垃圾鸟 哎呀！

translation.en: Okay, who had the chicken salad?
translation.zh: 好吧 好吧 谁吃了鸡肉沙拉？

translation.en: Did you leave the tip, Jaden?
translation.zh: 你给小费了吗 杰登？

translation.en: You see, I just gobble stuff up with--
translation.zh: 你知道 我刚才在狼吞虎咽…

translation.en: What was that, a snake I just ate? Ugh!
translation.zh: 那是什么 我刚吃了一条蛇吗？

translation.en: Look, we marabous fight over food
translation.zh: 看啊 我们会为食物大打出手

translation.en: like it's the last sticky bun at the bakery.
translation.zh: 就好像那是面包店里的最后一块面包
你懂的 这太搞笑了

translation.en: I dress so dapper in my tuxedo,
translation.zh: 我穿着燕尾服 衣冠楚楚

translation.en: yet, I'm not wearing any underwears.
translation.zh: 然而 我没有穿任何内衣

translation.en: I need underwears for my neck, don't I?
translation.zh: 我的脖子需要穿内衣 不是吗？

translation.en: Let me tell you folks, neck sacks are the next big thing.
translation.zh: 我告诉你们 颈袋将是下一个潮流装扮

translation.en: Now supposedly we marabou storks poop on our own legs,
translation.zh: 估计我们秃鹳会在自己的腿上大便

translation.en: I soar through the air with my big beak!
translation.zh: 我会带着自己的鹰钩大嘴翱翔天际
就像阿德里安布劳迪一样
你们好呀 火烈鸟女士们

translation.en: And... all the flamingos walk faster.
translation.zh: 火烈鸟们都赶紧跑开了

translation.en: from winged weirdos to a mythical titan,
translation.zh: 从有翼的怪咖到神秘的泰坦

translation.en: landing in the frigid waters around Canada,
translation.zh: 来到加拿大、格陵兰岛和俄罗斯

translation.en: The narwhal is a curious pale-colored porpoise,
translation.zh: 独角鲸是一种奇异的淡色海豚

translation.en: it's sometimes known as "the unicorn of the sea."
translation.zh: 有时被称为“海洋独角兽”

translation.en: translates to, "the one point to the sky."
"the one who pops inflatable life rafts."
That horn is actually a tusk,
with up to 10 million nerve endings inside.
translation.zh: 里面有多达一千万个神经末梢

translation.en: It helps detect fluctuations in water quality,
translation.zh: 能够帮助检测水质波动

translation.en: -Narwhals can change color as they age. -[computer game music continues]
translation.zh: 随着年龄的增长 独角鲸会变色

translation.en: Newborns and juveniles start out blue, black, and gray...
translation.zh: 婴儿和少年时 它是蓝色、黑色和灰色的

translation.en: ...all narwhals eventually become almost completely white.
translation.zh: 所有独角鲸 最终都会变成几乎通体全白

translation.en: -[bells tinkle loudly] -There's really not enough I can say [shouts] about these pointy-headed porp-stars!
translation.zh: 这些独角明星 真是永远说不完呢！

translation.en: Ugh! Can you stop it already with those cheesy sound effects?
translation.zh: 天啊！你能关掉这些烂俗的音效吗？

translation.en: It's a magical unicorn porpoise thingy,
translation.zh: 这是一个神奇的独角兽海豚

translation.en: and certainly don't sit on one,
translation.zh: 当然也不要坐在独角鲸身上

translation.en: -unless that's your thing. -[bells and springy sound effects]
♪ I like-ah the man o' war ♪
♪ I like-ah the crab in the road ♪
♪ A deer with a crazy fang ♪
